entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning this evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 4 except high plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4 except high plus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
